head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths PERESS, FAHMI MOSHI

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths PERESS, FAHMI MOSHI

block.p: PERESS--Fahmi Moshi, beloved uncle, in his 90s at home on April 26 in Fort Lauderdale. Baghdad-born businessman, US Army Sergeant in World War II, the last surviving grandson of Heskel Ezra Peress and Salha Rahmin Masri the Babylonian Jewish progenitors of our proud far-flung family spread throughout the United States, Israel, Canada, France, England, Switzerland and Brazil. In memory of our father, Henry Moshi Peress. Herbert Peress and family Maurice Peress and family

PERESS--Fahmi Moshi, beloved uncle, in his 90s at home on April 26 in Fort Lauderdale. Baghdad-born businessman, US Army Sergeant in World War II, the last surviving grandson of Heskel Ezra Peress and Salha Rahmin Masri the Babylonian Jewish progenitors of our proud far-flung family spread throughout the United States, Israel, Canada, France, England, Switzerland and Brazil. In memory of our father, Henry Moshi Peress. Herbert Peress and family Maurice Peress and family
